mapper.insert: insert into user (id, email, name, password, roleId, realName, telephone, address, sex, birthday, idCard, createTime, lastModifyTime) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{name}, #{password}, #{roleId}, #{realName}, #{telephone}, #{address}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{idCard}, #{createTime}, #{lastModifyTime})
mapper.select: select id, email, name, password, roleId, realName, telephone, address, sex, birthday, idCard, createTime, lastModifyTime from user
mapper.update: update user set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
update user set email = #{email},realName = #{realName},sex = #{sex},birthday = #{birthday},address = #{address},telephone = #{telephone},idCard = #{idCard} where name =#{name}
update user set roleId = #{roleId} where id =#{id}
